clinical_study.brief_title: Phone Coaching and Internet-delivered Weight Loss
clinical_study.official_title: Phone Coaching and Internet-delivered Weight Loss

collaborator.agency: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to examine whether adding phone coaching to an Internet-based weight loss program can improve weight loss outcomes at 4 months and 1 year. All individuals will receive a 4-month, Internet-delivered weight loss program followed by an 8-month Internet-delivered weight loss maintenance program. Some individuals will also be selected to receive either 3 weeks or 12 weeks of phone coaching. Assessments of weight, diet, physical activity, and psychosocial factors will occur at baseline, 4 months, and 1 year.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 4 months after start of weight loss program
12 months after start of weight loss program

secondary_outcome.measure: Cost per kg of weight loss
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 months and 12 months after start of weight loss program
4 months after start of weight loss program
4 months after start of weight loss program
secondary_outcome.description: number of days that participant self-monitored on study website

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 months after start of weight loss program
secondary_outcome.description: number of video lessons viewed on study website

arm_group.arm_group_label: Internet weight loss + possibility of brief phone coaching
arm_group.description: Participants randomized to this group will receive a 4-month, Internet-delivered weight loss program followed by an 8-month, Internet-delivered weight loss maintenance program. All individuals will be taught behavioral strategies for changing diet and physical activity behaviors via video lessons. Some participants in this group will also be selected to receive a brief period (i.e., once/week for 3 weeks) of phone coaching starting at week 5. The first coaching call will be approximately 45 minutes in duration and remaining calls with be 10-15 minutes. Coaches will problem solve with participants and help them develop an individualized meal plan.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Internet weight loss + possibility of extended phone coaching
arm_group.description: Participants randomized to this group will receive a 4-month, Internet-delivered weight loss program followed by an 8-month, Internet-delivered weight loss maintenance program. All individuals will be taught behavioral strategies for changing diet and physical activity behaviors via video lessons. Some participants in this group will also be selected to receive an extended period (i.e., once/week for 12 weeks) of phone coaching starting at week 5. The first coaching call will be approximately 45 minutes in duration and remaining calls with be 10-15 minutes. Coaches will problem solve with participants and help them develop an individualized meal plan.

Participants randomized to this group will receive a 4-month, Internet-delivered weight loss program followed by an 8-month, Internet-delivered weight loss maintenance program. All individuals will be taught behavioral strategies for changing diet and physical activity behaviors via video lessons. No participants in this group will receive any phone coaching.

intervention.arm_group_label: Internet weight loss + possibility of brief phone coaching
Internet weight loss + possibility of extended phone coaching

intervention.description: Some individuals will receive 3 weeks of phone coaching. Coaching calls will occur 1x/week, starting at week 5. Once coaching calls are completed, the participant will not have any other contact with their coach.
intervention.arm_group_label: Internet weight loss + possibility of brief phone coaching

intervention.description: Some individuals will receive 12 weeks of phone coaching. Coaching calls will occur 1x/week, starting at week 5. Once coaching calls are completed, the participant will not have any other contact with their coach.
intervention.arm_group_label: Internet weight loss + possibility of extended phone coaching

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 18-70
- BMI: 25-45 kg/m2
- Regular internet access
Exclusion Criteria:
- Currently pregnant, <6 months post-partum, nursing, or planning to become pregnant within the next 12 months.
- Current enrollment in a commercial weight loss program or other weight loss research study
- Currently taking weight loss medications
- Previously had bariatric surgery
- Inability to walk 2 blocks without stopping
- Any medical condition for which weight loss, dietary restriction, or physical activity is contraindicated

overall_official.affiliation: The Miriam Hospital's Weight Control and Diabetes Research Center

facility.name: The Miriam Hospital's Weight Control and Diabetes Research Center
